feat.value: This is the first known, extant fragment of codex MONB.GF and the second fragment of the work I See Your Eagerness. A lacuna of 12 pages (6 folios) follows. The next fragment (MONB.GF 31-32) and its parallel witness in MONB.CZ 25-26 have not yet been digitized. The next digitized document is from MONB.GL 29.
